p: In the measured period, the mean maximum temperature was 2.5% lower in the higher shaded-grown coffee, when compared to full sun system. SH3 registered 19.8 째C, followed by SH2 (19.9 째C), SH1 (20.0 째C), and full sun (20.3 째C). Comparing the values, there is statistical differences between full sun and SH3, but not between SH2 and SH1 ( Table 2).
